conbody.p: The contracting officer shall insert the clause at FAR 52.228-7, Insurance - Liability to Third Persons, in solicitations and contracts, other than those for construction contracts and those for architect-engineer services, when a cost-reimbursement contract is contemplated unless -
(a) Waived by the procurement officer; or
(b) The successful offeror represents in its offer that it is totally immune from tort liability as a State agency or as a charitable institution.
